history.text: Hey! Good to see you. What's up?
Hey! Good to see you. What's up?

```python
from flask import Flask

app = Flask(__name__)

@app.route('/')
def hello():
    return 'Hello, World!'

if __name__ == '__main__':
    app.run(debug=True)
```

运行：
```bash
pip install flask
python app.py
```

然后访问 http://localhost:5000 就能看到 "Hello, World!" 了。
